payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept WeChat Pay, Alipay, and all major international credit cards. Payment can be made in CNY or EUR.

customization.question: Can I customize my package?
customization.answer: Yes, all packages can be customized to better suit your preferences. Contact our team for personalization options.

languages.question: What languages do your guides speak?
languages.answer: Our guides are fluent in Mandarin Chinese, English, and French. We ensure clear communication throughout your trip.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book?
booking.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-3 weeks in advance, especially during peak season (June-September).
